bug.author: wangtz
bug.summary: WeChat mini-app doesn't work well with TFJS > 0.10.0
bug.description:
To get help from the community, check out our <denchmark-link:https://groups.google.com/a/tensorflow.org/forum/#!forum/tfjs>Google group</denchmark-link> . <denchmark-h:h4>TensorFlow.js version</denchmark-h>
0.10.0
<denchmark-h:h4>Browser version</denchmark-h>
Wechat mini-app <denchmark-h:h4>Describe the problem or feature request</denchmark-h>
thirdScriptError sdk uncaught third Error Could not find a global object Error: Could not find a global object at getGlobalNamespace (<denchmark-link:http://127.0.0.1:43511/appservice/utils/tfjs.js:2:50482>http://127.0.0.1:43511/appservice/utils/tfjs.js:2:50482</denchmark-link> ) at getOrMakeEnvironment (<denchmark-link:http://127.0.0.1:43511/appservice/utils/tfjs.js:2:50583>http://127.0.0.1:43511/appservice/utils/tfjs.js:2:50583</denchmark-link> ) at <denchmark-link:http://127.0.0.1:43511/appservice/utils/tfjs.js:2:50734>http://127.0.0.1:43511/appservice/utils/tfjs.js:2:50734</denchmark-link>
at Object.setPrototypeOf. (<denchmark-link:http://127.0.0.1:43511/appservice/utils/tfjs.js:2:69>http://127.0.0.1:43511/appservice/utils/tfjs.js:2:69</denchmark-link> ) at <denchmark-link:http://127.0.0.1:43511/appservice/utils/tfjs.js:2:157>http://127.0.0.1:43511/appservice/utils/tfjs.js:2:157</denchmark-link>
at require (<denchmark-link:http://127.0.0.1:43511/appservice/__dev__/WAService.js:19:7304>http://127.0.0.1:43511/appservice/__dev__/WAService.js:19:7304</denchmark-link> ) at <denchmark-link:http://127.0.0.1:43511/appservice/__dev__/WAService.js:19:7018>http://127.0.0.1:43511/appservice/__dev__/WAService.js:19:7018</denchmark-link>
at <denchmark-link:http://127.0.0.1:43511/appservice/pages/index/index.js:1:453>http://127.0.0.1:43511/appservice/pages/index/index.js:1:453</denchmark-link>
at require (<denchmark-link:http://127.0.0.1:43511/appservice/__dev__/WAService.js:19:7304>http://127.0.0.1:43511/appservice/__dev__/WAService.js:19:7304</denchmark-link> ) at :7:7 <denchmark-h:h4>Code to reproduce the bug / link to feature request</denchmark-h>
Copy compiled code to a file in wechat mini-app develop tool, and try to import it.

comments.comment: We have an official tfjs-wechat repo here: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tensorflow/tfjs-wechat>https://github.com/tensorflow/tfjs-wechat</denchmark-link>
